Disease.Name: GLYCOGEN STORAGE DISEASE TYPE II. ADULT ONSET
Disease.Summary: rare (1:100000 );autosomal recessive ;mutation in the GAA gene;1) infantile onset: cardiomegaly, progressive weakness, macroglossia;2) juvenile onset: (cardiac involvement), slower progression 3) adult onset: slowly progressive myopathy
